title: JetBrains Academy – February Digest
description: Here’s a roundup of all the good stuff from February  – AI skills to develop, scholarship opportunities, the latest programming and AI trends, and, as a little extra treat, a discount on a Hyperskill Premium subscription!
author: Maria Sharobaeva
excerpt: Learn how to upskill in AI, apply for scholarships to study in Europe, and explore the latest AI trends and programming insights in our February digest.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way Digest JetBrains AcademyJetBrains Academy – February Digest Here’s a roundup of all the good stuff from February  – AI skills to develop, scholarship opportunities, the latest programming and AI trends, and, as a little extra treat, a discount on a Hyperskill Premium subscription! Advance in AI skills AI Engineer Bootcamp by Hyperskill Everything you need to become an AI expert in just eight months. Get 1:1 mentorship, community support, tons of hands-on projects, collaboration with experienced developers, and the ability to learn cutting-edge AI tools like Replit and Windsurf. Secure your spot today! Learn more Master AI: Build Game Players Using AlphaZero Want to upskill in AI? In just 60 hours, gain hands-on experience building AI models from scratch directly in your IDE. Dive in AI Programming for Python Developers This course will help you become proficient at designing effective prompts and leveraging AI tools to write code faster, fix bugs more quickly, and build better software. Start learning Scholarship opportunities Study Computer Science with a Scholarship in Germany Want to study in Germany? Dive into software development, data analysis, and machine learning with expert-led courses. Apply for the JetBrains Foundation Scholarship at Constructor University by March 17! Discover more Fully Funded Computer Science Scholarships in Cyprus In partnership with JetBrains Academy, Neapolis University Pafos offers 15 fully funded scholarships for its Computer Science & AI bachelor’s program. Don’t miss the chance to apply! Find out more Tech insights Is Programming Actually Hard to Learn? Watch our latest video exploring whether programming is truly difficult to learn or if that’s just a myth. Share your thoughts in the comments! html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

Digest JetBrains Academy

JetBrains Academy – February Digest

Here’s a roundup of all the good stuff from February  – AI skills to develop, scholarship opportunities, the latest programming and AI trends, and, as a little extra treat, a discount on a Hyperskill Premium subscription!

Advance in AI skills

AI Engineer Bootcamp by Hyperskill

Everything you need to become an AI expert in just eight months. Get 1:1 mentorship, community support, tons of hands-on projects, collaboration with experienced developers, and the ability to learn cutting-edge AI tools like Replit and Windsurf. Secure your spot today!

Learn more

Master AI: Build Game Players Using AlphaZero

Want to upskill in AI? In just 60 hours, gain hands-on experience building AI models from scratch directly in your IDE.

Dive in

AI Programming for Python Developers

This course will help you become proficient at designing effective prompts and leveraging AI tools to write code faster, fix bugs more quickly, and build better software.

Start learning

Scholarship opportunities

Study Computer Science with a Scholarship in Germany

Want to study in Germany? Dive into software development, data analysis, and machine learning with expert-led courses. Apply for the JetBrains Foundation Scholarship at Constructor University by March 17!

Discover more

Fully Funded Computer Science Scholarships in Cyprus

In partnership with JetBrains Academy, Neapolis University Pafos offers 15 fully funded scholarships for its Computer Science & AI bachelor’s program. Don’t miss the chance to apply!

Find out more

Tech insights

Is Programming Actually Hard to Learn?

Watch our latest video exploring whether programming is truly difficult to learn or if that’s just a myth. Share your thoughts in the comments!

Watch now

The 2025 State of AI Development

Find out what’s in store for AI in 2025 with insights from out in-depth report.

Read now

Discounts

50% OFF Hyperskill Premium

Get 50% OFF a Hyperskill Premium subscription for a full year of hands-on learning. Build your own portfolio with real projects and earn certifications!
